Grandma Mauro and the Healing Mushroom of Togle Cave
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Adventure Information: Grandma Mauro and the Healing Mushroom of Togle Cave
By Infernus on Friday, April 16, 2004 - 10:55 pm:

Once Ryuwn is opened, you are sent on a quest to get a Healing Mushroom for Philia's grandmother, Mauro. The mushroom is on floor 4 in an empty room which you must go far enough into. Once you have gone far enough, a Blobster (Naga/???) will attack you, he has 166 life and can be powerful. Defeat him and you get the mushroom. The adventure will then end and you will be returned to your ranch.
